Package dillon.gameAPI.networking

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ClientConnector
    This class bridges the gap between the central server and the client, from the server to client.
    Message
    This object is an object that holds the information for an exchange in the program.
    NetworkConnection
    This handles a connection to a server, from client to server.
    NetworkServer
    This manages the networking server and clients.
Author:
Dillon - Github dg092099
